front.title: Use of the SHAKE One-way Hash Functions in the Cryptographic Message Syntax (CMS)

abstract.t: This document describes the conventions for using the SHAKE family of hash functions with the Cryptographic Message Syntax (CMS) as one-way hash functions with the RSA Probabilistic signature and ECDSA signature algorithms, as message digests and message authentication codes. The conventions for the associated signer public keys in CMS are also described.
